verbose_text: Thus, whereas trastuzumab treatment reduced the tumor volume in autophagy-competent JIMT-1 xenografts by only 5% 49 days post-injection, combination treatment with trastuzumab and chloroquine reduced the tumor volume of JIMT-1 xenografts by an impressive 92% over the same treatment period (XREF_FIG).
evidence: chloroquine reduced the tumor volume of JIMT-1 xenografts
